The small decisions we make either increase our risk of catching/spreading COVID-19, or they make things safer for ourselves and those around us. If you're in contact with someone elderly/ vulnerable, it may be better to reduce risky activities.  More info

If you've been told to isolate by Test and Trace or the NHS COVID-19 app, self-isolate for 14 days from the day you were last in contact with the person who tested positive. If Lucy had gone out on day 8, she could have spread COVID-19. More details here:
